hud.soft_waiting_for_hard: Stabilizer cleanup (light while waiting): Managed {{managedBefore}}MB -> {{managedAfter}}MB, RAM {{wsBefore}}MB -> {{wsAfter}}MB.
overlay.line: Stabilizer  P:{{current}}%  Avg({{window}}s):{{avg}}%  Trend:{{delta}}  Managed:{{managed}}MB  RAM:{{ws}}MB
gmcm.enabled.name: Enable mod
gmcm.enabled.tip: Turn Stardew Stabilizer on or off.
gmcm.autocleanup.name: Auto cleanup
gmcm.autocleanup.tip: Let the mod run cleanups automatically based on memory pressure.
gmcm.section.thresholds.tip: When pressure crosses these levels, the mod will act.
gmcm.softpressure.name: Soft cleanup threshold (%)
gmcm.softpressure.tip: Above this pressure, the mod may run a light cleanup (low stutter).
gmcm.hardpressure.name: Hard cleanup threshold (%)
gmcm.hardpressure.tip: Above this pressure, the mod may run a deep cleanup (can stutter).
gmcm.emergencypressure.name: Emergency hard threshold (%)
gmcm.emergencypressure.tip: Above this level, a deep cleanup may run anywhere to prevent crashes.
gmcm.usetrendavg.name: Use average pressure
gmcm.usetrendavg.tip: Use the recent average pressure (not just the latest second) when deciding to clean.
gmcm.trendwindow.name: Trend window (seconds)
gmcm.trendwindow.tip: How many seconds to average for the trend.
gmcm.sustain.name: Sustain time (seconds)
gmcm.sustain.tip: Pressure must stay above the soft threshold for this long before auto cleanup triggers. Set 0 to disable.
gmcm.hysteresis.name: Hysteresis (%)
gmcm.hysteresis.tip: Prevents repeated cleanups when pressure hovers around the threshold.
gmcm.hardmenuonly.name: Hard cleanup menu-only
gmcm.hardmenuonly.tip: Deep cleanups only happen in menus/fades (unless emergency).
gmcm.prefersoft.name: Prefer soft while waiting
gmcm.prefersoft.tip: If a deep cleanup is queued, do light cleanups while waiting for a safe moment.
gmcm.softcooldown.name: Soft cooldown (seconds)
gmcm.hardcooldown.name: Hard cooldown (seconds)
gmcm.hudmessages.name: Show HUD messages
gmcm.hudmessages.tip: Show a short message when a cleanup happens.
gmcm.overlay.name: Show overlay
gmcm.overlay.tip: Show a small overlay with pressure and trend.
gmcm.overlayx.name: Overlay X
gmcm.overlayy.name: Overlay Y
gmcm.lohcompact.name: Compact large allocations on hard cleanup
gmcm.lohcompact.tip: May reduce memory growth, but can increase stutter during deep cleanups.
gmcm.trimws.name: Trim Windows working set
gmcm.trimws.tip: Can reduce reported RAM usage, but may cause stutter later. Off by default.
gmcm.fallbackmem.name: Fallback available memory (MB)
gmcm.fallbackmem.tip: Used if the runtime can't detect available memory. Set close to your system RAM.
